item.description:
Manchester Raw Vegan Meetup Presents:
Steve Meyerowitz, Sproutman®
Health Crusader and Author of
Sprouts the Miracle Food and
Sproutman’s Kitchen Garden Cookbook
Kitchen Gardening: The Agriculture of Tomorrow
Learn How to Provide Fresh, Home-Grown, Organic Greens

Friday, March 5th, 2010 @ 6:30pm
Best Western Hotel
Executive Court Inn
13500 South Willow St.
Manchester, NH
Admission: $10, plus bring a dish to share! Or $25 & Chef KO Bisson will prepare a buffet dish for you. Call KO at (603)622-9505. Children eat free!
Respond to: www.meetup.com/rawfood-ManchNH/
RSVP to the March 5 Meetup
Join Steve Meyerowitz, the Sproutman as he shows us how to incorporate supercharged micro-greens into your everyday diet and save big on your food bills! From your soil-free kitchen garden to your dinner table for only pennies per pound! And no green thumb required! Living food doesn't get any better than this! Find out how these amazing living foods add energy to your days, and years to your life. Sproutman calls it:
“One Week from Seed to Salad.®”
Presentation followed by book signing and product sales.

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food March Meetup
